Key Match Events: Steph Curry exited the game with an ankle injury
Andrew Wiggins had 29 points on 11 of 15 shots
Pre-Game Insights: Steph Curry had a subpar start to the season, averaging 18.5 points in two games
Post-Match Reflections: The Warriors will hope Curry's injury doesn't hurt them in the long run
The outcome may have been different if the Warriors had Curry playing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Curry shot over 50.0% from the floor for the first time
Others: Curry's game came to an early end after he endured multiple injuries to his left ankle
